title: Grab a New Apple Pencil While It’s Down to $50 at Woot
description: Increase productivity or take your digital coloring to the next level with a new USB-C Apple Pencil. Snag yours for just $50 during Amazon’s Big Spring Sale.
author: Ingrid Cruz
excerpt: Increase productivity or take your digital coloring to the next level with a new USB-C Apple Pencil. Snag yours for just $50 during Amazon’s Big Spring Sale.
text: If you've recently bought an iPad, an Apple Pencil is a great way to turn it into an art canvas and explore more options. Using an Apple Pencil can also help you navigate your iPad without getting pesky fingerprints all over the screen. With Amazon's Big Spring Sale still with us for a few more hours, now is a great time to score a new Apple Pencil. Right now, you can find an Apple USB-C pencil for just $50 at Woot. That saves you $29 over its regular price, and is $19 cheaper than buying from Amazon's website. Woot is owned by Amazon, so it's no surprise to see the Big Spring Sale blossoming.The Apple Pencils at Woot are new open-box. That means that they're returns or restocks and still have approximately 120 days left in their Apple warranty. Each of these Apple Pencils has been checked to ensure they still work as new, and will arrive in original packaging. Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money. This Apple Pencil pairs and charges with a USB-C and is built with tilt sensitivity so you can experiment with brushstrokes, lettering and more. It's also perfect for note-taking and can be used with apps like Freeform, Notes and more. Make sure you to check your iPad's compatibility before you purchase the Apple Pencil. This pencil is compatible with the iPad Pro M4 (13-inch), iPad mini (6th generation), iPad (10th generation) and others.
